Package controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
controllers.UserController
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserControlInterface
public class UserController extends Object implements UserControlInterface
Represents the UserController class Holds a list of User objects Holds all methods to interface with the User object Created and held by the Controller ENUM
Since:
2021-11-24
Version:
1.1
Author:
Teo Xuan Ming
